I've successfully modified the textarea styling in the ChatInputArea component. The key change was updating the `max-h-[120px]` to `max-h-[50vh]`, which allows the textarea to expand up to 50% of the viewport height instead of being limited to 120 pixels.

The changes made:
- Changed `max-h-[120px]` to `max-h-[50vh]` - This allows the textarea to grow up to 50% of the viewport height
- Added `overflow-y-auto` to ensure scrolling works properly when content exceeds the textarea's visible area

This modification is responsive and will adapt to different screen sizes while preventing the textarea from taking up too much vertical space and leaving room for the message display area above it.
